title: Possessions in Nine-Tenths of a Car
description: Andrea brings the case against her friend Joe -- she claims he's taking a minimalist lifestyle to an extreme degree. Must Joe acquire some creature comforts?
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
content:encoded: Andrea brings the case against her friend Joe -- she claims he's taking a minimalist lifestyle to an extreme degree. Must Joe acquire some creature comforts?
